languages.text: "Тебе правда интересно?" {n}Мужчина немного оживляется, запускает руку с давно не стриженными ногтями в колтун волос.{/n} "Здесь был мой сад, в котором я пытался взрастить ростки прекрасного будущего. Пока не осознал, что будущего — в том смысле, в каком его понимают обычные люди — нет".

"Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."
languages.original_text: "Тебе правда интересно?" {n}Мужчина немного оживляется, запускает руку с давно не стриженными ногтями в колтун волос.{/n} "Здесь был мой сад, в котором я пытался взрастить ростки прекрасного будущего. Пока не осознал, что будущего — в том смысле, в каком его понимают обычные люди — нет".

That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand it."

That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."

"Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."

languages.text: “你真的想了解吗？”{n}他变得更加兴奋，用手捋了捋枯黄的头发。你注意到，他已经很长一段时间没有剪过指甲了。{/n}“这里曾是我的花园，我努力想要种下美好未来的种子。这些都是我意识到‘根本没有未来’之前的事情，普通人并不能理解我的顿悟。”
languages.original_text: "Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."

traits.locale_text: “你真的想了解吗？”{n}他变得更加兴奋，用手捋了捋枯黄的头发。你注意到，他已经很长一段时间没有剪过指甲了。{/n}“这里曾是我的花园，我努力想要种下美好未来的种子。这些都是我意识到‘根本没有未来’之前的事情，普通人并不能理解我的顿悟。”

languages.text: 「本当に知りたいのかね？」{n}彼は活気づいたかのように、もつれた髪に手を入れた。彼が最後に爪を切ったのは随分前だったことにあなたは気づく。{/n}「ここは私の庭だった。美しい未来の苗を育てようとした場所だ。それは、普通の人々が理解する意味での未来など存在しないと気づく前のことだった」
languages.original_text: "Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."

traits.locale_text: 「本当に知りたいのかね？」{n}彼は活気づいたかのようにもじゃもじゃの髪に手をやる。あなたは、彼が最後に爪を切ってから、しばらく時間が経っていることに気づいた。{/n}「ここは私の庭だった。美しい未来の苗を育てようとした場所だ。それは、普通の人が理解する意味での未来がないことに気づく前の話だ」
「本当に知りたいのかね？」{n}彼は活気づいたかのように、もつれた髪に手を入れた。彼が最後に爪を切ったのは随分前だったことにあなたは気づく。{/n}「ここは私の庭だった。美しい未来の苗を育てようとした場所だ。それは、普通の人々が理解する意味での未来など存在しないと気づく前のことだった」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr das wirklich wissen?" {n}Er wird lebhafter und streicht sich mit der Hand durch sein verfilztes Haar. Du bemerkst, dass er sich schon länger nicht mehr die Fingernägel geschnitten hat.{/n} "Das hier war mein Garten, wo ich die Saat einer wunderschönen Zukunft großziehen wollte. Bevor ich erkannte, dass es keine Zukunft gibt, zumindest keine, wie sie gewöhnliche Menschen verstehen."
languages.original_text: "Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr das wirklich wissen?" {n}Er wird lebhafter und streicht sich mit der Hand durch sein verfilztes Haar. Du bemerkst, dass er sich schon länger nicht mehr die Fingernägel geschnitten hat.{/n} "Das hier war mein Garten, wo ich die Saat einer wunderschönen Zukunft großziehen wollte. Bevor ich erkannte, dass es keine Zukunft gibt, zumindest keine, wie sie gewöhnliche Menschen verstehen."

languages.text: « Vous tenez vraiment à le savoir ? » {n}Il s'anime quelque peu et passe la main dans ses cheveux. Vous constatez qu'il ne s'est pas coupé les ongles depuis un certain temps.{/n} « Ceci était mon jardin, un jardin dans lequel je nourrissais l'espoir de cultiver les graines d'un avenir meilleur. Puis j'ai réalisé qu'il n'y avait pas d'avenir, en tout cas pas dans le sens où l'entendent les gens ordinaires. »
languages.original_text: "Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."

traits.locale_text: « Vous tenez vraiment à le savoir ? » {n}Il s'anime quelque peu et passe la main dans ses cheveux. Vous constatez qu'il ne s'est pas coupé les ongles depuis un certain temps.{/n} « Ceci était mon jardin, un jardin dans lequel je nourrissais l'espoir de cultiver les graines d'un avenir meilleur. Puis j'ai réalisé qu'il n'y avait pas d'avenir, en tout cas pas dans le sens où l'entendent les gens ordinaires. »

languages.text: «¿De verdad quieres saberlo?». {n}Se anima y pasa una mano por su pelo apelmazado. Te fijas en que hace bastante que no se corta las uñas.{/n} «Este era mi jardín, donde trataba de cultivar las semillas de un futuro maravilloso. Eso fue antes de que comprendiera que no hay ningún futuro tal y como lo entiende la gente corriente».
languages.original_text: "Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad quieres saberlo?». {n}Se anima y pasa una mano por su pelo apelmazado. Te fijas en que hace bastante que no se corta las uñas.{/n} «Este era mi jardín, donde trataba de cultivar las semillas de un futuro maravilloso. Eso fue antes de que comprendiera que no hay ningún futuro tal y como lo entiende la gente corriente».

languages.text: "Sahiden bilmek istiyor musun?" {n}Daha da hareketleniyor ve bir elini, keçeleşmiş saçlarında gezdiriyor. Tırnaklarını da epey zamandır kesmediğini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Burası benim bahçemdi, güzel bir geleceğin fidelerini yetiştirmeye çalışıyordum. Lakin tüm bunlar, sıradan insanların anladığı manada bir geleceğin olmadığını fark etmeden önceydi."
languages.original_text: "Do you truly want to know?" {n}He becomes more animated and runs a hand through his matted hair. You note it has been some time since he last trimmed his nails.{/n} "This was my garden, where I tried to grow the seedlings of a beautiful future. That was before I realised that there is no future, not in the sense ordinary people understand."
